name: JIAYI QIU
intro_content: I am an inspired data jounalist, a Bay area, USA-based publication. I use maps, data visualisations to cover a range of topics in technology, politics and social science.
Previously, I was a data scientists sepecialized in modeling and algorithms .
Prior to that, I graduated from the University of California,Berkeley with a Bachelor's Degree double majoring Economics and Data Science. This website showcases some of my recent works.
